bill_title: provide for a Black Hills buck deer season.
keywords: Department of Game, Fish and Parks

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for a Black Hills buck deer season. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The Game, Fish and Parks Commission shall, by rules promulgated pursuant to chapter 1-26, establish a buck deer season for the Black Hills area. The season shall be for buck deer that are three points or better. The commission may set a limit on the number of licenses sold for the season. The licenses shall be sold by any agent authorized by the department pursuant to this chapter on a first-come, first-served basis. A license entitles the holder to take one buck deer as provided by this section. The commission shall, by rules promulgated pursuant to chapter 1-26, establish the fees for a resident license and a nonresident license issued pursuant to this section. No nonresident may purchase a license pursuant to this section more than one day prior to the opening of the season. No licenses may be sold pursuant to this section after November tenth of each year. Section 2. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For the purposes of this Act, the Black Hills area is the Black Hills fire protection area as created by § 34-35-15.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
